alert.note: Alert for Henderson; Henry; Mercer; Warren (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS QuadCities (Eastern Iowa and Northwestern Illinois - Quad Cities)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 01 at 3:35AM CDT until August 01 at 4:00AM CDT by NWS QuadCities
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 400 AM CDT FOR NORTHEASTERN HENDERSON...NORTHERN WARREN...SOUTHERN MERCER... SOUTHWESTERN HENRY...NORTHEASTERN DES MOINES AND SOUTHEASTERN LOUISA COUNTIES... At 335 AM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Alpha to Alexis to near Kingston, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Monmouth, Aledo, Oquawka, Burgess, Mediapolis, Viola, Kirkwood, Keithsburg, Little York, Rozetta, Seaton, North Henderson, Oakville, Shale City, Lake Warren, Ogle, Kossuth, Alexis, Coldbrook and Bald Bluff. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: Torrential rainfall is occurring with these storms, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
